body: maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc: VisitLdaCurrentContextSlot, VisitLdaImmutableCurrentContextSlot, VisitStaCurrentContextSlot, VisitPushContext, VisitPopContext, VisitCreateBlockContext; functions: MaglevGraphBuilder::BuildLoadContextSlot, LoadAndCacheContextSlot, TrySpecializeLoadContextSlotToFunctionContext, TrySpecializeLoadScriptContextSlot, StoreAndCacheContextSlot, TrySpecializeStoreScriptContextSlot. These implement specialization of loads/stores to function/script contexts, caching loaded context slots via KnownNodeAspects loaded_context_slots. TDZ/hole checks via BuildCheckNotHole and ThrowReferenceErrorIfHole nodes. Interactions: for-in/of TDZ handled at parsing and bytecode generation (parser::CreateForEachStatementTDZ, interpreter bytecode HoleCheckElision logic).
explanation: Contains list of maglev graph builder handlers and helper functions related to context slot loads/stores and context push/pop, plus mention of caching via KnownNodeAspects and TDZ nodes. Useful for locating primary implementations.
